title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry bacon until crisp; remove from heat.
Whisk eggs, yolk, Parmesan, and pepper in a bowl.
Drain pasta, add to bacon pan (off heat), then stir in egg mixture.
Toss quickly until creamy. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken tikka cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka spices; grill or pan-sear.
Sauté onion; add tomato puree and simmer.
Stir in cream and garam masala.
Add cooked chicken and simmer 5–10 min.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: Crisp veggies tossed in a light soy-garlic sauce served over rice.
instructions: Heat oil in wok; add garlic and ginger.
Stir-fry vegetables until crisp-tender.
Add soy sauce; toss and serve over rice.

title: Beef Pilau
summary: Fragrant East African spiced rice with tender beef chunks.
instructions: Brown beef with onions and spices.
Add rice and stock; simmer until cooked.
Fluff and serve.

title: Chapati Wraps
summary: Soft chapati wraps stuffed with spiced chicken and fresh veggies.
instructions: Cook spiced chicken.
Warm chapati, layer chicken and veggies.
Wrap and serve.

title: Banana Bread
summary: Moist banana loaf with a hint of cinnamon—perfect with tea.
instructions: Mash bananas and mix wet ingredients.
Fold in dry ingredients.
Bake until a skewer comes out clean.
